column1: We recommend using the 3rd-party library to improve the mobile detection algorithm. Please, run the following command in the SSH: composer require mobiledetect/mobiledetectlib
column2: Recomendamos usar a biblioteca de terceiros para melhorar o algoritmo de detecção de dispositivos móveis. Por favor, execute o seguinte comando no SSH: composer require mobiledetect/mobiledetectlib

column1:
The current version of Magento is not supported. The AMP extension is designed only for Magento versions starting with 2.3 and higher.
Please contact Amasty Support Team to get information about the custom solutions or please update Magento to 2.3 or higher.

column1:
Time in seconds between the widget updates.
If not set, equals to 86400 seconds (24 hours). To update widget instantly, go to Cache Management and clear Blocks HTML Output cache.
Widget will not show products that begin to match the specified conditions until cache is refreshed.
column2:
Time in seconds between the widget updates.
If not set, equals to 86400 seconds (24 hours). To update widget instantly, go to Cache Management and clear Blocks HTML Output cache.
Widget will not show products that begin to match the specified conditions until cache is refreshed.
